snippet: Religious comments by Pakistan batsman Ahmed Shehzad to a Sri Lanka player, Tillakaratne Dilshan, after their one-day international Saturday were being investigated by the Pakistan Cricket Board.
lead_paragraph: Religious comments by Pakistan batsman Ahmed Shehzad to a Sri Lanka player, Tillakaratne Dilshan, after their one-day international Saturday were being investigated by the Pakistan Cricket Board.

headline.main: Cricket Player’s Religious Remarks Are Investigated
